org.corfudb.client.gossip

Class StreamPullGossip

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.client.gossip.StreamPullGossip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IGossip

    public class StreamPullGossip
extends Object
implements IGossip
    This gossip entry is used to tell the configuration master that a stream is being pulled. Note: This isn't really a gossip entry per se, but it uses the gossip server, so it is implemented as a gossip entry.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
